Package com.penthera.virtuososdk.client

Interface IForegroundNotificationProvider

  • public interface IForegroundNotificationProvider
    This interface defines the methods which must be provided for the client application to generate update notifications from within the service process. The interface must be declared within the applications Android manifest as a meta-data entry with the name "com.penthera.virtuososdk.notification.provider.impl". For example: <meta-data android:name="com.penthera.virtuososdk.notification.provider.impl" android:value="com.penthera.test.notification.ServiceForegroundNotificationProvider" /> The implementing class must have a default constructor and will be instantiated by the SDK within the * VirtuosoService. It will then be used from within the service * process to request updates to the app notifications. The implementing class will be used in two ways:
    • If the service is started in foreground mode then the notifications will be set for the foreground service using a fixed notification ID that is specified at Common.FOREGROUND_SERVICE_NOTIFICATION_ID . The application may choose it's own Channel ID for foreground service notifications and set that channel in this class.

      The service will call setExistingNotificationForReuse(Notification) to provide details of the existing foreground service notification that was created during app start up prior to requesting notifications for foreground mode.

    • If the service is started in background mode by WorkManager while the application is not in the foreground then the WorkManager will request a Notification when running on Android versions earlier than API31. The WorkManager notification will be configured with the same notification ID and Channel ID as in Foreground mode to ensure a only one Notification is shown. This class must correctly use the specified Channel in constructing notifications.
    Notifications may be switched between foreground and background mode. When this occurs, the method will be called for setExistingNotificationForReuse(Notification) and the implementation is responsible for repeating any internal configuration to ensure it returns notifications using the appropriate details.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Notification getForegroundServiceNotification​(Context context, IAsset file, Intent reasonIntent)
      Return an updated notification for an asset update which is provided via an Intent.
      void prepareNotificationProvider​(Context context)
      This method provides an opportunity for the implementing class to perform any startup actions.
      void setExistingNotificationForReuse​(Notification notification)
      This provides a copy of the original notification passed from the UI upon foreground service startup.
      boolean shouldUpdateForegroundServiceNotificationOnIntent​(Context context, Intent reasonIntent)
      Called to check if the provider wishes to generate a new notification for an intent.

    • Method Detail

      • prepareNotificationProvider

        void prepareNotificationProvider​(Context context)
        This method provides an opportunity for the implementing class to perform any startup actions.
        Parameters:
        context - The context used by the calling service for notification related calls.

      • setExistingNotificationForReuse

        void setExistingNotificationForReuse​(Notification notification)
        This provides a copy of the original notification passed from the UI upon foreground service startup. It enables you to grab the notification channel or any other parameters from that notification for re-use.
        Parameters:
        notification - The initial notification, generated from the client side process in a class derived from VirtuosoServiceStarter

      • shouldUpdateForegroundServiceNotificationOnIntent

        boolean shouldUpdateForegroundServiceNotificationOnIntent​(Context context,
                                                          Intent reasonIntent)
        Called to check if the provider wishes to generate a new notification for an intent. If this method returns true then the getForegroundServiceNotification(Context, IAsset, Intent) method will be called with the intent.
        Parameters:
        context - The context used by the calling service for notification related calls.
        reasonIntent - The intent for which a notification may be generated.
        Returns:
        true if a new notification will be generated for this intent.

      • getForegroundServiceNotification

        Notification getForegroundServiceNotification​(Context context,
                                              IAsset file,
                                              Intent reasonIntent)
        Return an updated notification for an asset update which is provided via an Intent.
        Parameters:
        context - The context used by the calling service for notification related calls.
        file - The asset currently being downloaded, for which the intent is being generated.
        reasonIntent - The intent for which a notification is required.
        Returns:
        The updated notification.
